name: Forest towers
description:
Forest towers is a tower defense strategy in which you will have an exciting adventure.

You are in the thicket of the forest, and your task is to protect the ancient castle from the attack of the forces of evil.
Depending on the type of tower, warriors storming the castle receive damage in different ways.
The goal of the game is to protect the castle and destroy the enemy on the map.

Game Features:
- Nice graphics.
- 9 interesting levels.
- Several types of enemies and towers with different characteristics.
